EmailTemplate.name: Client not contactable
EmailTemplate.subject: Client Not Contactable
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Dear {!Opportunity.Account}, Greetings from Solitaire! This is regarding your booking in {!Opportunity.Project__c}. We tried reaching you on your mobile number however, there was no response/your number was not reachable/your number was switched off. Request you to call us back on 020-6716 6716 at the earliest. We look forward to hearing from you. Regards, Team CRM @ Solitaire
